parameter.name: MXS_EXT_CFG
parameter.long_desc: Disables auto-configuration mode enabling MXS config through external software.

parameter.name: MXS_OP_MODE
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the operating mode of the MXS

parameter.name: MXS_SER_CFG
parameter.short_desc: Serial Configuration for Sagetech MXS Serial Port
parameter.long_desc: Configure on which serial port to run Sagetech MXS Serial Port.

parameter.name: MXS_TARG_PORT
parameter.long_desc: The MXS communication port to receive Target data from

parameter.name: UAVCAN_ECU_FUELT
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the type of fuel used in the vehicle's fuel tank. 0: Unknown 1: Liquid (e.g., gasoline, diesel) 2: Gas (e.g., hydrogen, methane, propane)

parameter.name: UAVCAN_ECU_MAXF
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the maximum fuel capacity of the vehicle's fuel tank.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_ENABLE
parameter.long_desc: 0 - UAVCAN disabled. 1 - Enables support for UAVCAN sensors without dynamic node ID allocation and firmware update. 2 - Enables support for UAVCAN sensors with dynamic node ID allocation and firmware update. 3 - Enables support for UAVCAN sensors and actuators with dynamic node ID allocation and firmware update. Also sets the motor control outputs to UAVCAN.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_LGT_ANTCL
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the minimum condition under which the system will command the ANTI_COLLISION lights on 0 - Always off 1 - When autopilot is armed 2 - When autopilot is prearmed 3 - Always on

parameter.name: UAVCAN_LGT_LAND
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the minimum condition under which the system will command the LIGHT_ID_LANDING lights on 0 - Always off 1 - When autopilot is armed 2 - When autopilot is prearmed 3 - Always on

parameter.name: UAVCAN_LGT_NAV
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the minimum condition under which the system will command the RIGHT_OF_WAY lights on 0 - Always off 1 - When autopilot is armed 2 - When autopilot is prearmed 3 - Always on

parameter.name: UAVCAN_LGT_STROB
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the minimum condition under which the system will command the STROBE lights on 0 - Always off 1 - When autopilot is armed 2 - When autopilot is prearmed 3 - Always on

parameter.name: UAVCAN_NODE_ID
parameter.long_desc: Read the specs at http://uavcan.org to learn more about Node ID.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_PUB_ARM
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN Arming Status stream publication uavcan::equipment::safety::ArmingStatus

parameter.name: UAVCAN_PUB_MBD
parameter.short_desc: publish moving baseline data RTCM stream
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN RTCM stream publication ardupilot::gnss::MovingBaselineData

parameter.name: UAVCAN_PUB_RTCM
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN RTCM stream publication uavcan::equipment::gnss::RTCMStream

parameter.name: UAVCAN_RNG_MAX
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the maximum valid range for a rangefinder connected via UAVCAN.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_RNG_MIN
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the minimum valid range for a rangefinder connected via UAVCAN.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_ASPD
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN airspeed subscriptions. uavcan::equipment::air_data::IndicatedAirspeed uavcan::equipment::air_data::TrueAirspeed uavcan::equipment::air_data::StaticTemperature

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_BARO
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN barometer subscription. uavcan::equipment::air_data::StaticPressure uavcan::equipment::air_data::StaticTemperature

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_BAT
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN battery subscription. uavcan::equipment::power::BatteryInfo ardupilot::equipment::power::BatteryInfoAux 0 - Disable 1 - Use raw data. Recommended for Smart battery 2 - Filter the data with internal battery library

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_BTN
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN button subscription. ardupilot::indication::Button

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_DPRES
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN differential pressure subscription. uavcan::equipment::air_data::RawAirData

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_FLOW
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN optical flow subscription.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_FUEL
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN fuel tank status subscription.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_GPS
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN GPS subscriptions. uavcan::equipment::gnss::Fix uavcan::equipment::gnss::Fix2 uavcan::equipment::gnss::Auxiliary

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_GPS_R
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN GPS Relative subscription. ardupilot::gnss::RelPosHeading

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_HYGRO
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN hygrometer subscriptions. dronecan::sensors::hygrometer::Hygrometer

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_ICE
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN internal combustion engine (ICE) subscription. uavcan::equipment::ice::reciprocating::Status

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_IMU
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN IMU subscription. uavcan::equipment::ahrs::RawIMU

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_MAG
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN mag subscription. uavcan::equipment::ahrs::MagneticFieldStrength uavcan::equipment::ahrs::MagneticFieldStrength2

parameter.name: UAVCAN_SUB_RNG
parameter.long_desc: Enable UAVCAN range finder subscription. uavcan::equipment::range_sensor::Measurement

parameter.name: UWB_INIT_OFF_X
parameter.short_desc: UWB sensor X offset in body frame
parameter.long_desc: UWB sensor positioning in relation to Drone in NED. X offset. A Positive offset results in a Position o

parameter.name: UWB_INIT_OFF_Y
parameter.short_desc: UWB sensor Y offset in body frame
parameter.long_desc: UWB sensor positioning in relation to Drone in NED. Y offset.

parameter.name: UWB_INIT_OFF_Z
parameter.short_desc: UWB sensor Z offset in body frame
parameter.long_desc: UWB sensor positioning in relation to Drone in NED. Z offset.

parameter.name: UWB_PORT_CFG
parameter.short_desc: Serial Configuration for Ultrawideband position sensor driver
parameter.long_desc: Configure on which serial port to run Ultrawideband position sensor driver.

parameter.name: UWB_SENS_ROT
parameter.long_desc: The orientation of the sensor relative to the forward direction of the body frame. Look up table in src/lib/conversion/rotation.h Default position is the antannaes downward facing, UWB board parallel with body frame.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_AG_IP
parameter.long_desc: If ethernet is enabled and is the selected configuration for uXRCE-DDS, the selected Agent IP address will be set and used. Decimal dot notation is not supported. IP address must be provided in int32 format. For example, 192.168.1.2 is mapped to -1062731518; 127.0.0.1 is mapped to 2130706433.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_CFG
parameter.long_desc: Configure on which serial port to run UXRCE-DDS Client.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_DOM_ID
parameter.long_desc: uXRCE-DDS domain ID

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_KEY
parameter.long_desc: uXRCE-DDS key, must be different from zero. In a single agent - multi client configuration, each client must have a unique session key.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_PRT
parameter.long_desc: If ethernet is enabled and is the selected configuration for uXRCE-DDS, the selected UDP port will be set and used.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_PTCFG
parameter.long_desc: Set the participant configuration on the Agent's system. 0: Use the default configuration. 1: Restrict messages to localhost (use in combination with ROS_LOCALHOST_ONLY=1). 2: Use a custom participant with the profile name "px4_participant".

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_SYNCC
parameter.long_desc: When enabled along with UXRCE_DDS_SYNCT, uxrce_dds_client will set the system clock using the agents UTC timestamp.

parameter.name: UXRCE_DDS_SYNCT
parameter.long_desc: When enabled, uxrce_dds_client will synchronize the timestamps of the incoming and outgoing messages measuring the offset between the Agent OS time and the PX4 time.

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_BAUD
parameter.long_desc: Default rate is 250Kbps, which is used in off-the-shelf MoadalAI ESC products.

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_CONFIG
parameter.long_desc: Selects what type of UART ESC, if any, is being used.

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_MODE
parameter.long_desc: Selects what type of mode is enabled, if any

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_PUB_BST
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Enable publishing of battery status
parameter.long_desc: Only applicable to ESCs that report total battery voltage and current

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_RPM_MAX
parameter.long_desc: Maximum RPM for ESC

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_RPM_MIN
parameter.long_desc: Minimum RPM for ESC

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_SDIR1
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC ID 1 Spin Direction Flag

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_SDIR2
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC ID 2 Spin Direction Flag

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_SDIR3
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC ID 3 Spin Direction Flag

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_SDIR4
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC ID 4 Spin Direction Flag

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_DEAD
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Turtle Mode Crash Flip Motor Deadband

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_EXPO
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Turtle Mode Crash Flip Motor expo

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_MINF
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Turtle Mode Crash Flip Motor STICK_MINF

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_OVER
parameter.long_desc: Only applicable to ESCs that report temperature

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_PERC
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Turtle Mode Crash Flip Motor Percent

parameter.name: VOXL_ESC_T_WARN
parameter.short_desc: UART ESC Temperature Warning Threshold (Degrees C)
parameter.long_desc: Only applicable to ESCs that report temperature

parameter.name: VOXL2_IO_BAUD
parameter.long_desc: Default rate is 921600, which is used for communicating with M0065.

parameter.name: VOXL2_IO_MAX
parameter.long_desc: Maximum duration (microseconds) for M0065 PWM

parameter.name: VOXL2_IO_MIN
parameter.long_desc: Minimum duration (microseconds) for M0065 PWM

parameter.name: VT_ARSP_BLEND
parameter.long_desc: Airspeed at which we can start blending both fw and mc controls. Set to 0 to disable.

parameter.name: VT_ARSP_TRANS
parameter.long_desc: Airspeed at which we can switch to fw mode

parameter.name: VT_BT_TILT_DUR
parameter.short_desc: Duration motor tilt up in backtransition
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds it takes to tilt form VT_TILT_FW to VT_TILT_MC.

parameter.name: VT_B_DEC_I
parameter.short_desc: Backtransition deceleration setpoint to pitch I gain

parameter.name: VT_B_DEC_MSS
parameter.long_desc: Used to calculate back transition distance in an auto mode. For standard vtol and tiltrotors a controller is used to track this value during the transition.

parameter.name: VT_B_TRANS_DUR
parameter.short_desc: Maximum duration of a back transition
parameter.long_desc: Transition is also declared over if the groundspeed drops below MPC_XY_CRUISE.

parameter.name: VT_B_TRANS_RAMP
parameter.short_desc: Back transition MC motor ramp up time
parameter.long_desc: This sets the duration during which the MC motors ramp up to the commanded thrust during the back transition stage.

parameter.name: VT_ELEV_MC_LOCK
parameter.long_desc: If set to 1 the control surfaces are locked at the disarmed value in multicopter mode.

parameter.name: VT_FWD_THRUST_EN
parameter.short_desc: Use fixed-wing actuation in hover to accelerate forward
parameter.long_desc: This feature can be used to avoid the plane having to pitch nose down in order to move forward. Prevents large, negative lift from pitching nose down into wind. Fixed-wing forward actuators refers to puller/pusher (standard VTOL), or forward-tilt (tiltrotor VTOL). Only active if demanded down pitch is below VT_PITCH_MIN. Use VT_FWD_THRUST_SC to tune it. Descend mode is treated as Landing too. Only active (if enabled) in Altitude, Position and Auto modes, not in Stabilized.

values.value: Enabled if distance to ground above MPC_LAND_ALT1
Enabled if distance to ground above MPC_LAND_ALT2
Enabled if distance to ground above MPC_LAND_ALT1 (except LANDING)
Enabled if distance to ground above MPC_LAND_ALT2 (except LANDING)

parameter.name: VT_FWD_THRUST_SC
parameter.short_desc: Fixed-wing actuation thrust scale for hover forward flight
parameter.long_desc: Scale applied to the demanded down-pitch to get the fixed-wing forward actuation in hover mode. Enabled via VT_FWD_THRUST_EN.

parameter.name: VT_FW_DIFTHR_EN
parameter.long_desc: Enable differential thrust seperately for roll, pitch, yaw in forward (fixed-wing) mode. The effectiveness of differential thrust around the corresponding axis can be tuned by setting VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_R / VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_P / VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_Y.

parameter.name: VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_P
parameter.short_desc: Pitch differential thrust factor in forward flight
parameter.long_desc: Differential thrust in forward flight is enabled via VT_FW_DIFTHR_EN.

parameter.name: VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_R
parameter.short_desc: Roll differential thrust factor in forward flight
parameter.long_desc: Differential thrust in forward flight is enabled via VT_FW_DIFTHR_EN.

parameter.name: VT_FW_DIFTHR_S_Y
parameter.short_desc: Yaw differential thrust factor in forward flight
parameter.long_desc: Differential thrust in forward flight is enabled via VT_FW_DIFTHR_EN.

parameter.name: VT_FW_MIN_ALT
parameter.long_desc: Minimum altitude for fixed-wing flight. When the vehicle is in fixed-wing mode and the altitude drops below this altitude (relative altitude above local origin), it will instantly switch back to MC mode and execute behavior defined in COM_QC_ACT.

parameter.name: VT_FW_QC_HMAX
parameter.long_desc: Maximum height above the ground (if available, otherwise above Home if available, otherwise above the local origin) where triggering a quad-chute is possible. At high altitudes there is a big risk to deplete the battery and therefore crash if quad-chuting there.

parameter.name: VT_FW_QC_P
parameter.long_desc: Absolute pitch threshold for quad-chute triggering in FW mode. Above this the vehicle will transition back to MC mode and execute behavior defined in COM_QC_ACT. Set to 0 do disable this threshold.

parameter.name: VT_FW_QC_R
parameter.long_desc: Absolute roll threshold for quad-chute triggering in FW mode. Above this the vehicle will transition back to MC mode and execute behavior defined in COM_QC_ACT. Set to 0 do disable this threshold.

parameter.name: VT_F_TRANS_DUR
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds used for a transition

parameter.name: VT_F_TRANS_THR
parameter.short_desc: Target throttle value for the transition to fixed-wing flight

parameter.name: VT_F_TR_OL_TM
parameter.long_desc: The duration of the front transition when there is no airspeed feedback available.

parameter.name: VT_LND_PITCH_MIN
parameter.short_desc: Minimum pitch angle during hover landing
parameter.long_desc: Overrides VT_PITCH_MIN when the vehicle is in LAND mode (hovering). During landing it can be beneficial to reduce the pitch angle to reduce the generated lift in head wind.

parameter.name: VT_PITCH_MIN
parameter.long_desc: Any pitch setpoint below this value is translated to a forward force by the fixed-wing forward actuation if VT_FW_TRHUST_EN is set to 1.

parameter.name: VT_PSHER_SLEW
parameter.short_desc: Pusher throttle ramp up slew rate
parameter.long_desc: Defines the slew rate of the puller/pusher throttle during transitions. Zero will deactivate the slew rate limiting and thus produce an instant throttle rise to the transition throttle VT_F_TRANS_THR.

parameter.name: VT_QC_ALT_LOSS
parameter.long_desc: Altitude error threshold for quad-chute triggering during fixed-wing flight. The check is only active if altitude is controlled and the vehicle is below the current altitude reference. The altitude error is relative to the highest altitude the vehicle has achieved since it has flown below the current altitude reference. Set to 0 do disable.

parameter.name: VT_QC_T_ALT_LOSS
parameter.long_desc: Altitude loss threshold for quad-chute triggering during VTOL transition to fixed-wing flight in altitude-controlled flight modes. Active until 5s after completing transition to fixed-wing. If the current altitude is more than this value below the altitude at the beginning of the transition, it will instantly switch back to MC mode and execute behavior defined in COM_QC_ACT. Set to 0 do disable this threshold.

parameter.name: VT_TILT_TRANS
parameter.short_desc: Normalized tilt in transition to FW

parameter.name: VT_TRANS_MIN_TM
parameter.long_desc: Minimum time in seconds for front transition.

parameter.name: VT_TRANS_P2_DUR
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds it takes to tilt form VT_TILT_TRANS to VT_TILT_FW.

parameter.name: VT_TRANS_TIMEOUT
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds after which transition will be cancelled. Disabled if set to 0.

parameter.name: WV_GAIN
parameter.long_desc: The desired gain to convert roll sp into yaw rate sp.

parameter.name: VTO_LOITER_ALT
parameter.long_desc: Altitude relative to home at which vehicle will loiter after front transition.

parameter.name: VERTIQ_IO_CFG
parameter.long_desc: Configure on which serial port to run Vertiq IO.

parameter.name: VTQ_ARM_BEHAVE
parameter.short_desc: The triggered behavior on PX4 arm
parameter.long_desc: The behavior triggered when the flight controller arms. You have the option to use your motors' arming behaviors, or to force all of your motors to arm

parameter.name: VTQ_BAUD
parameter.long_desc: The baud rate (in bits per second) used by the serial port connected with IQUART communication

parameter.name: VTQ_CONTROL_MODE
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - The module's control mechanism
parameter.long_desc: PWM Mode: Commands a fraction of battery voltage. This changes as the battery voltage changes. This is the least safe mode because the upper throttle limit is determined by the battery voltage. Voltage Mode: Commands a voltage. The motor will behave the same way throughout the life of a battery, assuming the commanded voltage is less than the battery voltage. You must set the MAX_VOLTS parameter. Velocity Mode: Closed-loop, commands a velocity. The controller will adjust the applied voltage so that the motor spins at the commanded velocity. This mode has faster reaction times. Only use this if you know the properties of your propeller. You must set the MAX_VELOCITY parameter.

parameter.name: VTQ_DISARM_TRIG
parameter.short_desc: The triggered behavior sent to the motors on PX4 disarm
parameter.long_desc: The behavior triggered when the flight controller disarms. You have the option to trigger your motors' disarm behaviors, set all motors to coast, or set a predefined throttle setpoint

parameter.name: VTQ_DISARM_VELO
parameter.short_desc: Velocity sent when DISARM_TRIGGER is Set Predefined Velocity Setpoint
parameter.long_desc: This is the velocity that will be sent to all motors when PX4 is disarmed and DISARM_TRIGGER is Set Predefined Velocity Setpoint

parameter.name: VTQ_FC_DIR
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - If the flight controller uses 2D or 3D communication
parameter.long_desc: The FC and the ESC must agree upon the meaning of the signal coming out of the ESC. When FCs are in 3D mode they re-map negative signals. This parameter keeps the FC and ESC in agreement.

parameter.name: VTQ_MAX_VELOCITY
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - Maximum velocity when CONTROL_MODE is set to Velocity
parameter.long_desc: Only relevant in Velocity Mode. This is the velocity the controller will command at full throttle.

parameter.name: VTQ_MAX_VOLTS
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - Maximum voltage when CONTROL_MODE is set to Voltage
parameter.long_desc: Only relevant in Voltage Mode. This is the voltage the controller will command at full throttle.

parameter.name: VTQ_MOTOR_DIR
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - The direction that the module should spin
parameter.long_desc: Set the targeted motor's spinning direction (clockwise vs. counter clockwise) and flight mode (2D non-reversible vs. 3D reversible)

parameter.name: VTQ_NUM_CVS
parameter.short_desc: The number of Vertiq IFCI parameters to use
parameter.long_desc: The total number of IFCI control variables being used across all connected modules

parameter.name: VTQ_PULSE_V_LIM
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - Max pulsing voltage limit when in Voltage Limit Mode
parameter.long_desc: This sets the max pulsing voltage limit when in Voltage Limit Mode.

parameter.name: VTQ_PULSE_V_MODE
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - 0 = Supply Voltage Mode, 1 = Voltage Limit Mode
parameter.long_desc: Supply Voltage Mode means that the maximum voltage applied to pulsing is the supplied voltage. Voltage Limit Mode indicates that PULSE_VOLT_LIM is the maximum allowed voltage to apply towards pulsing.

parameter.name: VTQ_REDO_READ
parameter.short_desc: Reinitialize the target module's values into the PX4 parameters
parameter.long_desc: Setting this value to true will reinitialize PX4's IQUART connected parameters to the value stored on the currently targeted motor. This is especially useful if your flight controller powered on before your connected modules

parameter.name: VTQ_TELEM_IDS_1
parameter.short_desc: Module IDs [0, 31] that you would like to request telemetry from
parameter.long_desc: The module IDs [0, 31] that should be asked for telemetry. The data received from these IDs will be published via the esc_status topic.

parameter.name: VTQ_TELEM_IDS_2
parameter.short_desc: Module IDs [32, 62] that you would like to request telemetry from
parameter.long_desc: The module IDs [32, 62] that should be asked for telemetry. The data received from these IDs will be published via the esc_status topic.

parameter.name: VTQ_THROTTLE_CVI
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - The module's Throttle Control Value Index
parameter.long_desc: This represents the Control Value Index where the targeted module will look for throttle commands

parameter.name: VTQ_TQUE_OFF_ANG
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - Offsets pulse angle to allow for mechanical properties
parameter.long_desc: This offsets where the pulse starts around the motor to allow for propeller mechanical properties.

parameter.name: VTQ_TRGT_MOD_ID
parameter.short_desc: The Module ID of the module you would like to communicate with
parameter.long_desc: This is the value used as the target module ID of all configuration parameters (not operational parameters). The Vertiq module with the module ID matching this value will react to all get and set requests from PX4. Any Vertiq client made with dynamic object IDs should use this value to instantiate itself.

parameter.name: VTQ_VELO_CUTOFF
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - The minimum velocity required to allow pulsing
parameter.long_desc: This is the velocity at which pulsing is allowed. Any velocity between VELOCITY_CUTOFF and -VELOCITY_CUTOFF will not pulse.

parameter.name: VTQ_X_CVI
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - CVI for the X rectangular coordinate
parameter.long_desc: This represents the Control Value Index where the targeted module will look for the X rectangular coordinate.

parameter.name: VTQ_Y_CVI
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - CVI for the Y rectangular coordinate
parameter.long_desc: This represents the Control Value Index where the targeted module will look for the Y rectangular coordinate.

parameter.name: VTQ_ZERO_ANGLE
parameter.short_desc: Module Param - The encoder angle at which theta is zero
parameter.long_desc: The encoder angle at which theta is zero. Adjust this number to change the location of 0 phase when pulsing.

parameter.name: ZENOH_ENABLE
parameter.long_desc: Zenoh

values.value: Enabled in VTOL MC mode, listen to request from system in FW mode
skip the controller and feedthrough the setpoints
